os open new file.description: os open new file with error hander and defer close file

fiber new instance.description: New creates a new Fiber named instance

fiber new instance with config.description: Create New creates a new Fiber named instance with config

fiber create mount.description: You can Mount Fiber instance by creating a *Mount

fiber create group.description: You can group routes by creating a *Group struct

fiber create fasthttp server.description: Server returns the underlying fasthttp server

fiber use middleware.description: Use registers a middleware route that will match requests with the provided prefix

fiber listen.description: Listen serves HTTP requests from the given addr.

fiber listenTLS.description: Listen with TLS serves HTTP requests from the given addr.

fiber listener.description: Listener can be used to pass a custom listener.

fiber CORS middleware.description: Create a Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) middleware instance

fiber get method.description: Get registers a route for GET methods that requests a representation of the specified resource. Requests using GET should only retrieve data.

fiber get method full.description: Get registers a route for GET methods that requests a representation of the specified resource. Requests using GET should only retrieve data.

fiber post method.description: Post registers a route for POST methods that is used to submit an entity to the specified resource, often causing a change in state or side effects on the server.

fiber post method full.description: Post registers a route for POST methods that is used to submit an entity to the specified resource, often causing a change in state or side effects on the server.

fiber patch method.description: Patch registers a route for PATCH methods that is used to apply partial modifications to a resource.

fiber patch method full.description: Patch registers a route for PATCH methods that is used to apply partial modifications to a resource.

fiber put method.description: Put registers a route for PUT methods that replaces all current representations of the target resource with the request payload.

fiber put method full.description: Put registers a route for PUT methods that replaces all current representations of the target resource with the request payload.

fiber delete method.description: Delete registers a route for DELETE methods that deletes the specified resource.

fiber delete method full.description: Delete registers a route for DELETE methods that deletes the specified resource.
